definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: For each assignment, you will analyze one feature-length film in which law is a central character.
sentences.chinese: 每份作業分析一部以法律爲中心點的故事長片。

sentences.english: "Searching for Sugar Man" won the best documentary award.
sentences.chinese: 《尋找小糖人》獲得最佳紀錄長片獎。

sentences.english: Disney was always parroting the feature-length mainstream films of his day. 3 So did many others.
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼一生中經常從主流的長片中照貓畫虎。

sentences.english: This movie won the Academy Award in the Best Animated Feature category in 2002.
sentences.chinese: 這部電影贏得了2002年奧斯卡獎最佳動畫長片獎。

sentences.english: She's now filming her second feature The Big Blue Lake.
sentences.chinese: 現正拍攝第二套劇情長片《大藍湖》。

definition: (of a movie, show etc) to attract large audiences
golden branch, jade leaves (idiom); fig. blue-blooded nobility, esp. imperial kinsmen or peerless beauty
Golden Lion, award at the Venice Film Festival
to determine the recipient of an award through discussion
third category movie (containing sexual or violent content)
theater chain (abbr. for 電影院線|电影院线)
to win instant success (idiom)/to become an instant hit

pinyin: Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3
